name: The Ascension Of The Lamb
description:
CW: Christian Trauma

A "Retro PBR" game about a mysterious cult that disappeared in the early 90s. You play as "xXx_Jibby_xXx", a hotshot horror vlogger in the early 2000s. A tip from a fan provided him the rough location of the lost cult's bunker.

The Ascension Of The Lamb Jam Information

This game was submitted to the "Classic" category of Go Godot Jam 3, a festival game jam celebrating and showcasing the Godot game engine.

Support

Donations are optional but greatly appreciated! I want to make a series of interconnected but stand-alone horror games called "The Dreams of the Uldark". This game, once finished, would be the entry-point for the series. So funding allows me to make more games like this, and even better games. Thank you for playing my game!
